Posts.Title: Waiting for Core Biopsy- 5.5 X 2 X 1.8 cm Mass WifeMomTeacher keepthefaith

Posts.Content: Apr 20, 2016 07:44AM WifeMomTeacher wrote: Sorry to hear you're waiting as well. My core biopsy was unfortunately not painless. It wasn't miserable, but I definitely could feel the first 3 samples being taken. The first one almost felt like it hit a rib. I'm 29 with small and dense breasts, so not sure if that affected the local anesthesic or not. Now to wait some more. : ( Good luck to you! Hopefully we both hear good news soon!
